verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> a servant <S%G1401><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> of <S%G1588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s chosen <S%G1588><s%> ones, <S%G2532><s%> and the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of <S%G1588><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is according to godliness, <S%G2150><s%>

in <S%G1909><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who can't <S%G893><s%> lie, promised <S%G1861><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> began; <S%G166><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5319><s%> in his own <S%G2398><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> revealed <S%G5319><s%> his <S%G846><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the message <S%G2782><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> was entrusted <S%G4100><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the commandment <S%G2003><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Savior; <S%G4990><s%>

to Titus, <S%G5103><s%> my true <S%G1103><s%> child <S%G5043><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to a common <S%G2839><s%> faith: <S%G4102><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> mercy, <S%G1656><s%> and peace <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Savior. <S%G4990><s%>

I <S%G2641><s%> left you <S%G4571><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Crete <S%G2914><s%> for this <S%G5127><s%> reason, <S%G2443><s%> that you <S%G4571><s%> would set in order <S%G1930><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> that were lacking, <S%G2532><s%> and appoint <S%G2525><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> in <S%G1473><s%> every <S%G2596><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> directed <S%G1299><s%> you; <S%G4671><s%>

if <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> blameless, <S%G410><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> of one <S%G1520><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> who believe, <S%G4103><s%> who are not <S%G3361><s%> accused <S%G2724><s%> of loose <S%G810><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> unruly behavior. <S%G506><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the overseer <S%G1985><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be <S%G1511><s%> blameless, <S%G410><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s steward; <S%G3623><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> self-pleasing, <S%G829><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> easily angered, <S%G3711><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> given to wine, <S%G3943><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> violent, <S%G4131><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> greedy for dishonest gain; <S%G146><s%>
but <S%G235><s%> given to hospitality, <S%G5382><s%> a lover of good, <S%G5358><s%> sober <S%G4998><s%> minded, <S%G1342><s%> fair, holy, <S%G3741><s%> self-controlled; <S%G1468><s%>

holding <S%G472><s%> to the faithful <S%G4103><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G2596><s%> is according to the teaching, <S%G1322><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he may be <S%G5600><s%> able <S%G1415><s%> to <S%G2532><s%> exhort <S%G3870><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the sound <S%G5198><s%> doctrine, <S%G1319><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to convict <S%G1651><s%> those who contradict him. <S%G483><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> also many <S%G4183><s%> unruly <S%G506><s%> men, <S%G2532><s%> vain talkers <S%G3151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> deceivers, <S%G5423><s%> especially <S%G3122><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the circumcision, <S%G4061><s%>

whose <S%G3739><s%> mouths <S%G1993><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be stopped; <S%G1993><s%> men who <S%G3748><s%> overthrow <S%G396><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> houses, <S%G3624><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> things which <S%G3739><s%> they ought <S%G1163><s%> not, <S%G3361><s%> for <S%G5484><s%> dishonest <S%G150><s%> gain <S%G2771><s%>'s sake. <S%G5484><s%>

One <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them, <S%G4396><s%> a prophet of <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G846><s%> own, <S%G2398><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "Cretans <S%G2912><s%> are always <S%G104><s%> liars, <S%G5583><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> beasts, <S%G2342><s%> and idle <S%G692><s%> gluttons. <S%G1064><s%>"

This <S%G3778><s%> testimony <S%G3141><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> true. <S%G227><s%> For this cause, <S%G1223><s%> reprove <S%G1651><s%> them <S%G846><s%> sharply, <S%G664><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they may be sound <S%G5198><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the faith, <S%G156><s%>

not <S%G3361><s%> paying attention to <S%G4337><s%> Jewish <S%G2451><s%> fables <S%G3454><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> commandments <S%G1785><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> who turn away from <S%G654><s%> the truth. <S%G225><s%>

To the pure, <S%G2513><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are pure; <S%G2513><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> to those who are defiled <S%G3392><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unbelieving, <S%G571><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> is pure; <S%G2513><s%> but <S%G235><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G3563><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> are defiled. <S%G3392><s%>

They profess <S%G3670><s%> that they know <S%G1492><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> by their works <S%G2041><s%> they deny <S%G720><s%> him, <S%G5607><s%> being abominable, <S%G947><s%> disobedient, <S%G545><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unfit <S%G96><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work. <S%G2041><s%>
